title: Mancala Online
description: Mancala is a casual board game where strategic prowess meets thrilling competition. Unlock new boards and pebbles, challenging friends or global enthusiasts. Sharpen your skills against intelligent AI, climb the leaderboard, and enjoy the excitement of capturing stones in this classic game. Dive into the world of Mancala today, customize your gameplay, and become the ultimate champion in this captivating pebble adventure!
